trans-unit.source: The abstract base class that represents a binding terminal that supports the flow of data into and out of an <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La classe base astratta che rappresenta un terminale dell'associazione che supporta il flusso di dati in e da un <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets an <xref href="System.Activities.ArgumentDirection"></xref> that specifies whether the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref> represents the flow of data into an <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>, out of an <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>, or both into and out of an <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Activities.ArgumentDirection"> </xref> che specifica se il <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref> rappresenta il flusso di dati in un <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>, da un <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>, o dentro e fuori un <xref href="System.Activities.ActivityDelegate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the direction of the flow of data through the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei valori di enumerazione che specifica la direzione del flusso di dati tramite il <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the value of the argument using the specified activity context.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il valore dell'argomento utilizzando il contesto dell'attività specificato.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Activities.Location"></xref> of the value referenced by the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref href="System.Activities.Location"> </xref> del valore a cui fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The location of the value referenced by the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il percorso del valore a cui fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Activities.DelegateArgument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string value used by <xref:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name*>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il valore di stringa usato da <xref:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name*>.</xref:System.Activities.DelegateArgument.Name*>
